feed.title: Follow-up regarding Motion to Activate BIP 3

entry.title: Follow-up regarding Motion to Activate BIP 3
entry.summary: In a recent development, Ruben Somsen expressed gratitude towards Jonas, Chris, and Coperbyte Solutions for their contributions and feedback. Following this, Ruben announced that the Activation Pull Request (PR) has been rebased to include process changes applicable to the newly published Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) 433. This update signifies that, from a technical standpoint, the Activation PR is prepared for merging. This progress was shared within the context of the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, where subscribers are updated on the latest developments and discussions regarding Bitcoin's codebase enhancements and proposals.
